resources.string:
Welcome!

 	To begin setup, connect to the WIFI with your Vera system, and select one the appropriate options:

 	Vera UI7:		If you are running the latest software, or a recently purchased Vera unit, this is most likely your software version (Build 1.7xxx.)

 	Vera UI5:		Intended for Vera systems running older software (Build 1.5xxx.)

To enable Remote Access: 

 		Connect to the WIFI with the Vera system.

 		Select the Update Remote Credentials option to enter credentials. You will be able to switch back and forth once entered.

To update your Remote Access Credentials:

 		Connect to the WIFI with the Vera system.

 		Select the Update Credentials option to update your credentials.

Background Polling

 		Polling allows you to see the current state of your Vera system without the need of manual refresh. While the app is running, it will intermittently request the latest information (about every 5 seconds.)

 		Select the Enable Polling option to turn polling on.

To update your Location Details:

 		Connect to the WIFI with the Vera system.

 		Select the Update Location Details option to update information surrounding local and remote connection URLs.

Troubleshooting Options:

 		Retry Remote:	Retry using current configuration.

 		Update Location:	Update with latest connection URLs. Must be connected to WIFI.

 		Attempt Local:	Re-attempt leveraging local connection URLs. Must be connected to WIFI.

Troubleshooting Options:

 		Retry Local:	Retry using current configuration. Must be connected to WIFI.

 		Update Location:	Update with latest connection URLs. Must be connected to WIFI.

 		Attempt Remote:	If available, re-attempt leveraging remote connection URL.
